user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
epics.summary: Implement secure login with multi-factor authentication for bank customers.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system that allows users to securely log in using multi-factor authentication methods such as SMS, email, or authenticator apps. This EPIC includes creating user registration and login APIs, integrating with existing identity providers if applicable, and ensuring compliance with financial sector regulations and data privacy standards. Focus will be on security, scalability, and ease of use.

epics.title: Personalized User Dashboard
epics.summary: Build a dynamic, personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services.
epics.description: Design and develop a personalized dashboard that greets users upon login. The dashboard should display their accounts, balances, eligible products, and ongoing service requests based on user profiles. It must integrate with the core banking system to fetch real-time data and provide actionable insights. The layout should be intuitive, mobile-responsive, and align with the bank’s branding guidelines.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal provides a consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
epics.description: Create a responsive front-end design using modern web frameworks to deliver uniform user experience across devices. Implement adaptive layouts and intuitive navigation to ensure accessibility and usability. This EPIC involves front-end development, cross-browser testing, mobile optimization, and compliance with accessibility standards to serve all customer demographics effectively.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Implement guided workflows for account opening and service modification with minimal clicks.
epics.description: Develop automated workflows that allow customers to initiate new account openings or modifications to existing services seamlessly. The design should emphasize ease of use, guiding users through each step with minimal navigation. Include form validations, dynamic content, eligibility checks, and real-time integration with internal systems to facilitate decision-making and streamline operations.

epics.title: Document Management and Upload Functionality
epics.summary: Enable customers to upload necessary documents securely through the portal.
epics.description: Implement a secure document management system allowing users to upload, store, and manage required documents for various banking services. The system should support multiple file formats, perform validation checks, and ensure data encryption during transit and storage. Integrate this with the account opening and service workflows to enable document submission and retrieval.

epics.title: Save and Resume Application Feature
epics.summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and resume later without data loss.
epics.description: Develop functionality for users to save their progress while filling out forms or requests, ensuring they can resume from where they left off. The system should autosave key data, enable draft management, and prevent data loss in case of interruptions or timeouts. This enhances convenience and increases successful completion rates for self-service actions.

epics.title: Real-Time Notifications and Updates
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and email notifications for user requests.
epics.description: Build a notification service that delivers real-time updates to users regarding their account openings, service modifications, and other interactions. This includes push, email, and in-portal notifications with configurable preferences. Ensure integration with backend workflows to trigger updates at appropriate workflow transitions and log all communication events for audit purposes.

epics.title: Activity and Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive record of all customer interactions within the portal.
epics.description: Implement a system for tracking and storing user activity, transaction history, and service requests. Provide users with an easily accessible timeline of their past interactions. Ensure auditability for regulatory purposes, and incorporate search, filter, and export features to enhance transparency and user trust.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Establish role-based access controls to ensure appropriate feature access.
epics.description: Create and configure a role-based access control (RBAC) system that governs what users can view or modify based on their profile and authorization level. Ensure customers can only access products and services relevant to their eligibility. Integrate this with authentication systems and administrative management panels for flexibility and security.

epics.title: Core Banking and Database Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with existing core banking systems while maintaining a separate database layer.
epics.description: Develop secure APIs and data synchronization mechanisms to connect the portal with the bank’s core banking platform. Establish a separate optimized database for the portal to improve performance and reduce load on core systems. Key tasks include designing data models, implementing synchronization logic, and ensuring secure data exchange between systems.

epics.title: Security and Compliance Framework
epics.summary: Implement data security and compliance measures to protect sensitive financial information.
epics.description: Establish comprehensive security practices across the portal, covering encryption, secure storage, auditing, DDoS protection, and regular vulnerability assessments. Ensure compliance with banking and data protection regulations such as PCI-DSS and GDPR. Deploy logging and monitoring capabilities to detect and respond to potential incidents swiftly.

user_stories.title: User Registration API
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to register with the banking portal, so that I can create an account and log in.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User data validation, integration with identity providers, secure data handling, compliance with privacy standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The user registration API should securely handle user data and comply with relevant security standards.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a valid user registration request, When the data is submitted, Then the system should create a new user account and respond with a success message.

user_stories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication Setup
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to set up multi-factor authentication, so that I can secure my account with additional verification.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support for SMS, email, and authenticator apps, easy setup process, secure authentication flows.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to set up and use multi-factor authentication successfully after registration.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has completed registration, When they set up multi-factor authentication, Then the system should enable it and require it on subsequent logins.

user_stories.title: Display User Accounts and Balances
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to see my accounts and balances on the dashboard, so that I can quickly view my financial status.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Real-time data fetching, intuitive display, secure data transmission.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should display all user accounts and their respective balances upon login.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user is logged in, When they access the dashboard, Then their accounts and balances should be displayed correctly.

user_stories.title: Display Eligible Products and Services
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to see eligible banking products and services on the dashboard, so that I can choose appropriate options.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration with core banking system, personalized recommendations, secure data handling.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should show products and services tailored to the user's profile and eligibility.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user is logged in, When they access the dashboard, Then eligible products and services should be displayed based on their profile.

user_stories.title: Adaptive Layout Implementation
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want the portal to have an adaptive layout, so that I can use it seamlessly across different devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Responsive design, compatibility with various screen sizes, intuitive navigation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal should provide a consistent experience and layout across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accesses the portal on different devices, When they navigate through it, Then the layout should adapt seamlessly to the screen size.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: New Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a guided workflow to open a new account, so that I can complete the process with minimal clicks.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Step-by-step process, form validations, dynamic content, real-time system integration.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The workflow should guide users smoothly through the account opening process, ensuring all necessary steps and validations are completed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user initiates a new account opening, When they follow the guided workflow, Then the account should be created successfully upon completion with all validations passed.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Service Modification Workflow
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a streamlined workflow to modify my existing services, so that I can make changes with minimal navigation.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dynamic content updates, eligibility checks, minimal steps for modifications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The workflow should allow users to modify services efficiently with minimal steps and clear guidance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user wishes to modify a service, When they follow the modification workflow, Then the service should be updated successfully with prompts at each step.

user_stories.title: Secure Document Upload
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to securely upload necessary documents, so that I can complete my banking tasks.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support for multiple file formats, validation checks, data encryption.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The document upload feature should securely handle and validate files during upload.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user needs to upload a document, When they select and submit a file, Then the system should validate and store the file securely.

user_stories.title: Save Application Progress
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to save my progress in an application, so that I can resume it later without data loss.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Autosave key data, draft management, prevent data loss.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to save their progress and resume applications accurately without data loss.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user starts an application, When they save progress midway, Then the system should retain the data and allow resumption from the same point.

user_stories.title: Real-Time Notifications Service
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to receive real-time updates about my requests, so that I am always informed of their status.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Push, email, and in-portal notifications, configurable preferences.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The system should deliver real-time notifications promptly at appropriate workflow stages.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has an ongoing request, When the status changes, Then a real-time notification should be sent to the user based on their preferences.

user_stories.title: Track Interaction History
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to see my interaction history within the portal, so that I can review past activities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Comprehensive activity logs, search and filter options, export functionality.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The system should maintain a detailed history of user interactions accessible for review.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user logs in, When they access their interaction history, Then the system should display all past activities with search and filter options.

user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to configure role-based access controls, so that users can only access features relevant to them.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Role definitions, access permissions, integration with authentication systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The RBAC system should enforce access restrictions based on user roles efficiently.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has a certain role, When they access the portal, Then they should only see and use features allowed by their role.

user_stories.title: Integrate with Core Banking Systems
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate the portal with core banking systems, so that real-time data synchronization is achieved.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Secure APIs, data models, synchronization logic.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal should integrate seamlessly with core banking systems, ensuring data consistency and performance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given integration with core systems is set up, When data changes occur, Then the portal should reflect these changes in real-time.

user_stories.title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
user_stories.description: As a security officer, I want to ensure the portal complies with all relevant security and data protection standards, so that customer data is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Encryption, secure storage, auditing, DDoS protection, compliance with PCI-DSS and GDPR.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal should implement robust security measures and comply with all regulatory standards.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the security framework is in place, When the system is audited, Then it should meet all PCI-DSS and GDPR compliance requirements.
